content.para1: iBints is sponsering one lakh worthy portfolio for the best model who is contesting at the impulse 2k17 fest (25-03-2017) conducted by muslim association college of engineering venjaramood at RDR auditorium edapazhanji trivandrum. Best wishes for all the team.
We are planning a campaign to improve the awareness of people about security, at Trivandrum Central Stadium on 25th of this month.
content.para2: We are planning a campaign to improve the awareness of people about security, at Trivandrum Central Stadium on 25th of this month.

content.para1: iBints Independence Day and Onam special offer will start from August 10 up to September 15. Please contact us for further details. +919567050008,+917592915008 Share your security needs. Make your properties and environments are secure.
